Posts.Content: marymack2012 wrote: Dear all,  I understand that all of you lovely ladies have so much on your mind and if this question is inappropriate i will delete it.  I was speaking to another lady who said that she was diagnosed with stage IV when she went to her ct planning scan with liver mets.  She said she was diagnosed with stage 2 bcin July 2011 and had surgery in august 2011, followed by 6*FEC chemotherapy and had her planning scan in Feb/March. I was wondering if any of use ladies had ever heard of this before Thanks and love to all. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mets found during planning scan ? marymack2012 marymack2012
